query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO ITEM_DATA (EVENT_CRF_ID, ITEM_ID, STATUS_ID, VALUE, OWNER_ID, DATE_CREATED) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,NOW())

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE ITEM_DATA SET EVENT_CRF_ID=?,ITEM_ID=?,STATUS_ID=?, VALUE=?,DATE_UPDATED=NOW(),UPDATE_ID=? WHERE ITEM_DATA_ID=?

query.name: updateStatusByEventCRF
query.sql: UPDATE item_data SET status_id=? WHERE event_crf_id=?

query.name: findAllBySectionIdAndEventCRFId
query.sql: SELECT d.* FROM item_data d, item_form_metadata m WHERE d.item_id = m.item_id AND m.section_id = ? AND d.event_crf_id=?

query.name: findByItemIdAndEventCRFId
query.sql: SELECT * FROM item_data WHERE item_id=? AND event_crf_id = ?

query.name: findMinMaxDates
query.sql: select min(date_created) as min_date, max(date_created) as max_date from item_data

query.name: findAllBlankRequiredByEventCRFId
query.sql: select id.* from item_data id, item i, item_form_metadata ifm where id.event_crf_id=? and id.item_id = i.item_id and i.item_id = ifm.item_id and ifm.crf_version_id=? and ifm.required=true and (id.value='' or id.value= null)
